title: Sailing With Our Father

tokens.lyric: If the trip you're traveling gets long,

lines.raw: [G]If the trip you're traveling gets long,

tokens.lyric: Wishing for a new day to come;

lines.raw: [D]Wishing for a new day to come;

tokens.lyric: When the sun rises in the morning

lines.raw: [Am]When the sun rises in the morning

tokens.lyric: We'll set sail and move on.
You know His ship will never sway;

lines.raw: [D]You know His ship will never sway;

tokens.lyric: We've found the Promised Land today.
Look out with joy in your eyes,

lines.raw: [G]Look out with joy in your eyes,

tokens.lyric: The winds of Truth will guide our way;

lines.raw: [D]The winds of Truth will guide our way;

tokens.lyric: On waves of Love we'll sail away.

lines.raw: [C]On waves of Love we'll sail away.

tokens.lyric: Darkness it always turns to light,
The Promised Land is in sight;
He's our guiding star by night
And in the day our bright sunlight.

lines.raw: [C]And in the day our bright sunlight.
